c74object.name: pdm.queue.view

method.name: name
method.digest: Set the name of the queue
method.description: Links this view to a queue buffer.

method.name: markersize
method.digest: Set the size of the markers
method.description: Sets the size of the markers that indicate the read position.

method.name: showmarkers
method.digest: Set the visibility of the markers
method.description: Sets the visibility of the markers that indicate the read position.

method.name: showheaders
method.digest: Set the visibility of the headers
method.description: Sets the visibility of the row headers that indicate the queue number.

method.name: fontsize
method.description: Sets the font size of the text.

c74object.description: Visualizes queue contents and read position.
